style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167; 230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167; 240.12b-2 of this chapter). </span></div><div><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">Emerging growth company </span><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Times New Roman',serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%"><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="c-1" name="dei:EntityEmergingGrowthCompany" format="ixt-sec:boolballotbox" id="f-22">&#9744;</ix:nonNumeric></span><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%"> </span></div><div style="margin-top:9pt"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. </span><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial Unicode MS',sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%"> </span><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#9744;</span></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div style="height:42.75pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div><span><br/></span></div></div></div><div id="i38081dc2d5bf408191685abc4d0a84d9_7"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"/><div style="min-height:42.75pt;width:100%"><div><span><br/></span></div></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div style="-sec-extract:summary;margin-bottom:9pt;text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:120%">Item&#160;1.01. Entry into a Material Definitive Agreement.</span></div><div style="text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:112%">On August 25, 2025, The Boeing Company (&#8220;Boeing&#8221;) entered into a $3.0 billion, 364-day revolving credit agreement (the &#8220;Agreement&#8221;) with Citibank, N.A. (&#8220;Citibank&#8221;) and JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. (&#8220;JPMorgan&#8221;) as joint lead arrangers and joint book managers, Citibank as administrative agent, JPMorgan as syndication agent, and a syndicate of lenders as defined in the Agreement. This facility replaces Boeing&#8217;s previous $3.0 billion, three-year revolving credit agreement, which was scheduled to terminate on August 25, 2025. Under the Agreement, Boeing will pay a fee of between 0.125% and 0.300% per annum on the commitments, depending on Boeing&#8217;s credit rating. Borrowings under the Agreement that are based on SOFR will generally bear interest at an annual rate equal to Term SOFR (as defined in the Agreement) plus between 1.250% and 1.700% per annum, depending on Boeing&#8217;s credit rating. All other borrowings under the Agreement will bear interest at an annual rate equal to the highest of (1) the rate announced publicly by Citibank, from time to time, as its &#8220;base&#8221; rate, (2) the federal funds rate plus 0.50% and (3) Term SOFR for a one-month tenor in effect on such day plus 1.00%, plus in each of (1), (2) and (3) between 0.250% and 0.700% per annum, depending on Boeing&#8217;s credit rating. The Agreement is scheduled to terminate on August 24, 2026, subject to Boeing&#8217;s right to, following payment of additional fees, convert outstanding borrowings into term loans with a maturity date that is the one-year anniversary of the termination date, as well as Boeing&#8217;s right to request that the lenders extend the term for an additional 364 days.</span></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div style="text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:112%">The Agreement contains customary terms and conditions, including covenants restricting Boeing&#8217;s ability to permit consolidated debt (as defined in the Agreement) in excess of 60% of Boeing&#8217;s total capital (as defined in the agreement), to incur liens, and to merge or consolidate with another entity and a covenant requiring Boeing to maintain liquidity (as defined in the Agreement) of at least $5.0 billion. Events of default under the Agreement include: (1) failure to pay outstanding principal or interest within five business days of when due, (2) determination that any representation or warranty was incorrect in any material respect when made, (3) failure to perform any other term, covenant or agreement, which failure is not remedied within 30 days of notice, (4) a cross-default with other debt in certain circumstances, (5) the incurrence of certain liabilities under the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and (6) bankruptcy and other insolvency events. If an event of default occurs and is continuing, the lenders would have the right to accelerate and require the repayment of all amounts outstanding under the Agreement and would not be required to advance any additional funds.</span></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div style="text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:112%">The foregoing description is qualified in its entirety by the Agreement, which is filed as exhibit 10.1 hereto.</span></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div style="text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:112%">Certain of the lenders and their affiliates have performed, and may in the future perform, for Boeing and its subsidiaries, various banking, underwriting, and other financial services, for which they receive customary fees and expenses.</span></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div style="text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:112%">Boeing&#8217;s five-year revolving credit agreement, dated as of May 15, 2024, which consists of $4.0 billion of total commitments and Boeing's five-year revolving credit agreement, dated as of August 24, 2023, which consists of $3.0 billion of total commitments, each remain in effect.</span></div><div style="text-align:justify"><span><br/></span></div><div style="margin-bottom:9pt;text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:120%">Item 2.03. Creation of a Direct Financial Obligation or an Obligation Under an Off-Balance Sheet Arrangement of a Registrant.</span></div><div style="text-align:justify"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:115%">The information set forth above under &#8220;Item 1.01. Entry into a Material Definitive Agreement&#8221; is incorporated herein by reference.</span></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:120%">Item 9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits.</span></div><div><span><br/></span></div><div style="margin-bottom:6pt;padding-left:31.5pt;text-indent:-18pt"><span style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:120%">(d) Exhibits.</span></div><div style="padding-left:31.5pt;text-indent:-18pt"><table style="border-collapse:collapse;display:inline-table;margin-bottom:5pt;vertical-align:text-bottom;width:93.713%"><tr><td style="width:1.0%"/><td style="width:9.664%"/><td style="width:0.1%"/><td white-space: pre;">TABLE OF CONTENTS<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.12pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 91.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><font style="left: 90pt; position: absolute; width: 92.57pt;">Article and Section<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt; width: 15.43pt;"></font></font><font style="left: 198pt; position: absolute; width: 0pt;"><font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt; width: 36pt;"></font></font><font style="left: 234pt; position: absolute; width: 0pt;"><font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt; width: 36pt;"></font></font><font style="left: 270pt; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 86.4pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.85pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 100.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">the two same ratings, the Applicable Margin and Applicable Percentage will be based on<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; Any determination by the Agent that a Lender is a Defaulting<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">Lender under clauses (i) through (v) above shall be conclusive and binding absent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 331.2pt; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 174.53pt;">Use of Defined Terms&#59; References<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 282.53pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 257.34pt;">. Any defined term used in the plural preceded by the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.87pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 443.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">definite article encompasses all members of the relevant class. Any defined term used in<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 458.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">the singular preceded by &#8220;a&#8221;, &#8220;an&#8221; or &#8220;any&#8221; indicates any number of the members of the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 472.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">relevant class. All references in this Agreement to a Section, Article, Schedule or Exhibit<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">are to a Section, Article, Schedule or Exhibit of or to this Agreement, unless otherwise<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 216pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">Rate, the Term SOFR Reference Rate or Term SOFR, any alternative, successor or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 230.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">replacement rate (including any Benchmark Replacement) or any relevant adjustments<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 244.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">thereto, in each case, in a manner adverse to the Borrowers. The Agent may select<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 259.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">information sources or services in its reasonable discretion to ascertain the Base Rate, the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 273.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">Term SOFR Reference Rate, Term SOFR or any other Benchmark, in each case pursuant<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 288pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">to the terms of this Agreement, and shall have no liability to any Borrower, any Lender or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 302.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">any other person or entity for damages of any kind, including direct or indirect, special,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 316.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">punitive, incidental or consequential damages, costs, losses or expenses (whether in tort,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">contract or otherwise and whether at law or in equity), for any error or calculation of any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 345.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 409.94pt;">such rate (or component thereof) provided by any such information source or service.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.12pt; position: absolute; top: 371pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; top: 396.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 211.23pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre;">Amounts and Terms of the Advances<font style="display: inline-block; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 49.3pt;">Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 447.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 144.81pt;">Obligation to Make Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 252.81pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 287.18pt;">. Each Lender severally agrees, on the terms and conditions<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 461.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.88pt;">hereinafter set forth, to make Advances in U.S. dollars to the Borrowers from time to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.88pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 476pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 490.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">Date in an aggregate principal amount at any time outstanding not to exceed such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 504.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 111.91pt;">Lender&#8217;s Commitment.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 530.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; width: 325.3pt;">. Each Borrowing shall be in an aggregate amount not less than<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 544.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 326.45pt;">$10,000,000 or an integral multiple of $1,000,000 in excess thereof.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 570pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(c)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 88.48pt;">Type of Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 196.48000000000002pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 343.4pt;">. Each Borrowing shall consist of Advances of the same Type made on<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.88pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 584.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">the same day by the Lenders ratably according to their respective Commitments. Within<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 613.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 410.39pt;">prepay pursuant to Section 2.12, and reborrow under this Section 2.1 and Section 2.2.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 638.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 92.29pt;">Making Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 200.29000000000002pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;">.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 664pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; Each Borrowing shall be made on notice, given by a Borrower to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">the Agent not later than 1&#58;00 p.m. (New York City time) on the day of the proposed<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; Each such Notice of Borrowing shall be in<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 86.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 289.42pt;">substantially the form of Exhibit B, specifying the requested<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 111.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 11.31pt;">(i)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 115.91pt;">date of such Borrowing,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 137.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 14.64pt;">(ii)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 250.82pt;">Type of Advances constituting such Borrowing, and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 162.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 188pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 109pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431pt;">Every Notice of Borrowing given by a Subsidiary Borrower must be countersigned by an<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 202.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">authorized representative of TBC, in order to evidence the consent of TBC, in its sole<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 216.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">discretion, to that proposed Borrowing. Upon receipt of a Notice of Borrowing, the Agent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 231.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 239.77pt;">shall promptly give notice to each Lender thereof.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 256.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.98pt;">(b)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 91.97pt;">Funding Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 199.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 340.02pt;">. Each Lender shall, before 3&#58;00 p.m. (New York City time) on the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 271pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">date of such Borrowing, make available for the account of its Applicable Lending Office<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 285.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 299.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">such Borrowing. After the Agent&#8217;s receipt of such funds and upon fulfillment of the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; Each Notice of Borrowing shall be irrevocable and binding. In the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">fund the Advance to be made by such Lender as part of such Borrowing when such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 296.04pt;">Advance, as a result of such failure, is not made on such date.<font style="display: inline-block; Unless the Agent has received notice from a Lender prior to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">date a corresponding amount. If and to the extent that a Lender has not so made such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.87pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; The failure of any Lender to make the Advance to be<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">made by it as part of any Borrowing shall not relieve any other Lender of its obligation, if<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; The Borrowers shall, subject to the next<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 249pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">succeeding sentence, repay to the Agent for the ratable account of the Lenders on the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 263.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">Termination Date the aggregate principal amount of the Advances then outstanding. If this Term Loan Conversion Option is exercised, then, on the Termination<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; The amounts so converted shall be treated for all purposes<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 421.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 338.95pt;">of this Agreement as Advances except that after the Termination Date&#58;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.96pt;">principal amount of the Term Loans payable to such Lender from time to time&#59;<font style="display: inline-block; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 364.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 389.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 22.63pt;">Fees<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 130.63pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 409.33pt;">. TBC agrees to pay to the Agent for the account of each Lender a facility fee<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 475.14pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 42.64pt;">provided<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 432.8pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; The amount of the Facility<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">Fee payable on October 1, 2025 and on the Maturity Date shall be prorated based on the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; For the avoidance of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">doubt, if TBC has exercised the Term Loan Conversion Option, for purposes of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">the amount of the &#8220;Commitments&#8221; at any time shall equal the amount of the Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 119.91pt;">outstanding at such time.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 714pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; TBC shall have the right, upon at least three Business Days&#8217; notice<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 428.07pt;">minimum amount of $10,000,000 or an integral multiple of $1,000,000 in excess thereof.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 111.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 106.28pt;">Mandatory Reduction<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 214.28pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 325.66pt;">. At the close of business on the Termination Date, the aggregate<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 126.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">Commitments shall be automatically and permanently reduced, on a pro rata basis, by an<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 140.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">amount equal to the amount by which the aggregate Commitments immediately prior to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 155pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">giving effect to such reduction exceed the aggregate unpaid principal amount of the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 169.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 132.9pt;">Advances then outstanding.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 194.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">2.9<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 55.25pt;">&#91;Reserved&#93;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 163.25pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;">.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 220.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 21pt;">2.10<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 109.58pt;">SOFR Determination<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 217.57999999999998pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;">.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 245.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 146.06pt;">Methods to Determine SOFR<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 254.06pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 285.93pt;">. The Agent shall determine Term SOFR for each SOFR<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 260pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">Advance by using the methods described in the definition of the term &#8220;Term SOFR,&#8221; and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 274.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">shall give prompt notice to the relevant Borrowers and the Lenders of each such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 288.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 69.6pt;">determination.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 314.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 55.59pt;">&#91;Reserved&#93;.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 339.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(c)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 159.82pt;">Inadequate or Unavailable SOFR<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 267.82pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 272.09pt;">. If, with respect to any SOFR Advances (i) the Majority<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 354pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">Lenders notify the Agent that SOFR for any Interest Period for such Advances will not<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 368.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">adequately reflect the cost to such Majority Lenders of making, funding or maintaining<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 382.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">their respective SOFR Advances for such Interest Period or (ii) the sources used to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 397.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">determine Term SOFR hereunder (including, without limitation, any of the screen pages<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 411.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">specified herein or any of the substitute or successor pages thereto) are unavailable and a<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 426pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">Benchmark Transition Event has not occurred, the Agent shall forthwith so notify the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 440.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 231.1pt;">relevant Borrowers and the Lenders, whereupon<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 465.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 11.31pt;">(i)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.96pt;">each such SOFR Advance will automatically, on the last day of the then existing<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 480.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 306.02pt;">Interest Period therefor, Convert into a Base Rate Advance, and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 505.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 14.64pt;">(ii)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.91pt;">the obligation of the Lenders to make, or to Convert Base Rate Advances into,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 520pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.96pt;">SOFR Advances shall be suspended until the Agent notifies the Borrowers and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 534.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 363.32pt;">the Lenders that the circumstances causing such suspension no longer exist.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 559.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 21pt;">2.11<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 334.16pt;">Voluntary Conversion of Advances&#59; Continuation of Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 442.16pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 97.81pt;">. (a) Subject to the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 574.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">provisions of Sections 2.10 and 2.15, any Borrower may Convert all such Borrower&#8217;s<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 588.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">Advances of one Type constituting the same Borrowing into Advances of the other Type<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 603pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">on any Business Day, upon notice given to the Agent not later than 11&#58;00 a.m. (New<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 617.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">York City time) on the third U.S. Government Securities Business Day prior to the date<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 631.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 140.2pt;">of the proposed Conversion&#59; <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 248.2pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 42.64pt;">provided<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 290.84000000000003pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 6.24pt;">, <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 297.08000000000004pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 44.29pt;">however,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 341.37pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 198.54pt;"> that the Conversion of a SOFR Advance<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 646.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">into a Base Rate Advance may be made on, and only on, the last day of an Interest Period<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 660.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">for such SOFR Advance. Each such notice of a Conversion shall, within the restrictions<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 675pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 115.53pt;">specified above, specify<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 700.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 11.31pt;">(i)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 157.21pt;">the date of such Conversion, and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 725.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 147.54pt;">the Advances to be Converted.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div></div></div><div style="--justify: justify; --position: absolute; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #CCCC; content-visibility: auto; float: none; font-size: 0; height: 792pt; margin: 10px auto 10px auto; overflow: hidden; padding: 0; position: relative; width: 612pt;"><div style="left: 0pt; position: absolute; top: 741.6pt;"><div style="width: 468pt;"><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; top: 8.04pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 22.44pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 7pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><font style="left: 72pt; position: absolute; width: 0pt;"><font style="display: inline-block; height: 4.85pt; width: 467.99pt;"></font></font></font></div></div></div><div style="left: 0pt; position: absolute; top: 0pt;"><div style="width: 468pt;"></div></div><div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 72pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 37.38pt;">(b)&#160; &#160;  <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif;
