height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 172.01999999999998pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 367.95pt;">.&#160; Subject to the provisions of Sections 2.10 and 2.15, the Borrower may<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 86.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">continue SOFR Advances upon notice given to the Agent not later than 11&#58;00 a.m. (New<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 100.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">York City time) on the third U.S. Government Securities Business Day prior to the last<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 115.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">day of the applicable Interest Period.&#160; Each such notice of a conversion shall, within the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 129.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 171.79pt;">restrictions specified above, specify<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 279.78999999999996pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 155pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: none; white-space: pre; width: 205.09pt;">the applicable Interest Period selected, and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 178pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: none; white-space: pre; width: 144.88pt;">the Advances to be continued.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 201pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.87pt;">If no notice of continuation is given to the Agent before the end of an Interest Period as<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.87pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 215.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">set forth above, the applicable SOFR Advances shall automatically be continued for an<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 229.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 191.84pt;">Interest Period of one month&#8217;s duration.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 255.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 21pt;">2.12<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 67.27pt;">Prepayments<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 175.26999999999998pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 364.65pt;">. Any Borrower shall have the right at any time and from time to time, upon<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 269.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">prior written notice from such Borrower to the Agent, to prepay its outstanding principal<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 284pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">obligations with respect to its Advances in whole or ratably in part (except as provided in<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 298.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 112.99pt;">Section 2.15 or 2.19), <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 220.99pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 42.64pt;">provided<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 263.63pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 276.37pt;"> that every notice of prepayment given by a Subsidiary<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 312.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">Borrower must be countersigned by an authorized representative of TBC, in order to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 327.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">evidence the consent of TBC, in its sole discretion, to that prepayment. Such prepaying<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 341.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">Borrower may be obligated to make certain prepayments of obligations with respect to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 356pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 357.69pt;">one or more Advances subject to and in accordance with this Section 2.12.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 381.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 185.14pt;">Base Rate Borrowings Prepayments<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 293.14pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 246.83pt;">. With respect to Base Rate Borrowings, such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 395.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">prepayment shall be without premium or penalty, upon notice given to the Agent, and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 410.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">shall be made not later than 11&#58;00 a.m. (New York City time) on the date of such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 424.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">prepayment. The applicable Borrower shall designate in such notice the amount and date<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 439pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.88pt;">of such prepayment. Accrued interest on the amount so prepaid shall be payable on the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.88pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 453.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">first Business Day of the calendar quarter next following the prepayment. The minimum<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 467.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">amount of Base Rate Borrowings which may be prepaid on any occasion shall be<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 482.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">$10,000,000 or an integral multiple of $1,000,000 in excess thereof or, if less, the total<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 496.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 323.05pt;">amount of Base Rate Advances then outstanding for that Borrower.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 522pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 158.55pt;">SOFR Borrowings Prepayments<font style="display: inline-block; width: 273.4pt;">. With respect to SOFR Borrowings, such prepayment<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">shall be made on at least three U.S. Government Securities Business Days&#8217; prior written<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; The<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 289.84000000000003pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 250.11pt;">. If, due to the acceleration of any of the Advances<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.86pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 292.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; If, due to either<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 317.6pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.89pt;">the introduction of, or any change in, or new interpretation of, any law or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; A certificate as to such amounts submitted to the relevant<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 631pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">foreign regulatory authorities, in each case pursuant to Basel III, regardless of the date<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 345.6pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 371pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 232.12pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 307.83pt;">. In addition, each Borrower shall pay any present or future<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 385.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">stamp, documentary, excise, property or similar taxes, charges, or levies that arise from<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; Each Borrower shall indemnify each Lender and the Agent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; This<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; Within 30 days after the date of any payment of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; If the forms<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.88pt; provided, <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 471.5pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.97pt;">the applicable reporting requirements of FATCA (including those contained in<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.86pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div></div></div><div style="--justify: justify; --position: absolute; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #CCCC; For purposes of this Section 2.14(e)(iii)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 144pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 350.66pt;">FATCA shall include any Treasury regulations or interpretations thereof.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 169.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 11.97pt;">(f)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 183.62pt;">Lender Failure to Provide IRS Forms<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 291.62pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 248.35pt;">. For any period with respect to which any Lender<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 183.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">has failed to provide TBC with the appropriate form described in subsection 2.14(e)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 198.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">form originally was required to be provided or if such form otherwise is not required<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 227pt; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 255.8pt; <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 170.59pt; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 219.23000000000002pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 41.29pt;">however<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 284.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 329.31pt;">shall reasonably request to assist such Lender to recover such Taxes.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 310pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.98pt;">(g)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 144.66pt;">Treatment of Certain Refunds<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 252.66pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 287.23pt;">. If the Agent or a Lender determines, in its sole discretion,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 324.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.86pt;">that it has received a refund of any Taxes or Other Taxes as to which it has been<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.86pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 338.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">indemnified by a Borrower or with respect to which a Borrower has paid additional<font style="display: inline-block; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">amounts pursuant to this Section 2.14, it shall pay to such Borrower an amount equal to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 367.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.88pt;">such refund (but only to the extent of indemnity payments made, or additional amounts<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.88pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 382pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">paid, by such Borrower under this Section with respect to the Taxes or Other Taxes<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 396.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">giving rise to such refund), net of all out-of-pocket expenses of the Agent or such Lender,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 410.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">as the case may be, and without interest (other than any interest paid by the relevant<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 425.2pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 439.6pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 454pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">Borrower (plus any penalties, interest or other charges imposed by the relevant<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 468.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">governmental authority) to the Agent or such Lender in the event the Agent or such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 482.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">Lender is required to repay such refund to such governmental authority. This paragraph<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 497.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.85pt;">shall not be construed to require the Agent or any Lender to make available its tax returns<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.85pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 511.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">(or any other information relating to its taxes that it deems confidential) to any Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 526pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 96.59pt;">or any other Person.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 551.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 21pt;">2.15<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 45.29pt;">Illegality<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 153.29pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 229.78pt;">. If any Lender shall notify the Agent that either<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 576.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">there is any introduction of, or change in or in the interpretation of, any law or regulation<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 591.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">that in the opinion of counsel for such Lender in the relevant jurisdiction makes it<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 605.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 58.62pt;">unlawful, or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 631pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.98pt;">(b)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 357.32pt;">any central bank or other governmental authority asserts that it is unlawful<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 465.32pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 656.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.88pt;">for such Lender to continue to fund or maintain any SOFR Advances or to perform its<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.88pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 670.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">obligations hereunder with respect to SOFR Advances hereunder, then, upon the issuance<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 685.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">of such opinion of counsel or such assertion by a central bank or other governmental<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 699.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">authority, the Agent shall give notice of such opinion or assertion to the Borrowers<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 714pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">(accompanied by such opinion, if applicable). The Borrowers shall forthwith (or at the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div></div></div><div style="--justify: justify; --position: absolute; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #CCCC; content-visibility: auto; float: none; font-size: 0; height: 792pt; margin: 10px auto 10px auto; overflow: hidden; padding: 0; position: relative; width: 612pt;"><div style="left: 0pt; position: absolute; top: 741.6pt;"><div style="width: 468pt;"><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; top: 8.04pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 300pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: none; white-space: pre;">28<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 4.85pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 22.44pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 7pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; position: absolute; top: 0pt;"><div style="width: 468pt;"></div></div><div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 72pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">end of the then-current Interest Period if the SOFR Advances may be lawfully maintained<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 86.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 176.18pt;">as SOFR Advances until then) either<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 111.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.89pt;">prepay in full all SOFR Advances made by such Lender, with accrued interest<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 126.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 48.95pt;">thereon or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 151.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 14.64pt;">(ii)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 396pt;">Convert each such SOFR Advance made by such Lender into a Base Rate<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 166pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 45.62pt;">Advance.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 191.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">Upon such prepayment or Conversion, the obligation of such Lender to make SOFR<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 205.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">Advances, or to Convert Advances into SOFR Advances, shall be suspended until the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 220.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">Agent shall notify the Borrowers that the circumstances causing such suspension no<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 234.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 63.94pt;">longer exists.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 260pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 21pt;">2.16<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 147.93pt;">Payments and Computations<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 255.93pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;">.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 285.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 172.73pt;">Time and Distribution of Payments<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 280.73pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 259.23pt;">. The Borrowers shall make each payment hereunder<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 299.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">and with respect to any Advances or under any Notes, without counterclaim or setoff, not<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 314.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">later than 11&#58;00 a.m. (New York City time) on the day when due in U.S. dollars to the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 328.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">Agent at the Agent&#8217;s Account in same day funds. The Agent shall promptly thereafter<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 343pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">cause to be distributed like funds relating to the payment of principal or interest or fees<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 357.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">Borrower will not make such payment in full, the Agent may assume that such Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 155pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.84pt;">has made such payment in full to the Agent on such date and the Agent may, in reliance<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.8399999999999pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 169.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">upon such assumption, cause to be distributed to each such Lender on such due date an<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 183.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">amount equal to the amount then due such Lender. If and to the extent that such Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 212.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 139.71pt;">Increase Total Commitment<font style="display: inline-block; width: 292.26pt;">. The Company has the right to increase the total of the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; width: 325.18pt;">. A Non-Extending Lender shall be obligated, at the request of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">TBC, to assign at any time prior to the close of business on the Termination Date<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 281.2pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">survive the termination of the Agreement pursuant to Section 8.3) and obligations<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">hereunder to one or more Lenders or other commercial banks nominated by TBC and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 473.32pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 66.59pt;">Replacement<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 338.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; In order to qualify as a Replacement Lender, a Lender or lender must satisfy<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 353.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">all of the requirements of this Agreement (including without limitation the terms of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 367.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">Section 2.20 relating to Required Assignments). Such obligation of each Non-Extending<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.73pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 382pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 299.54pt;">Lenders is subject to such Non-Extending Lender&#8217;s receiving <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Arial&#39;, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 407.54pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 10.64pt;">(i)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; Upon such assignment,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 482.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">become a Continuing Lender, and the Agent shall make appropriate entries in the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 497.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 156.16pt;">Register to reflect the foregoing.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 522.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 21pt;">2.22<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 112.92pt;">Subsidiary Borrowers<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 220.92000000000002pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;">.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 548pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;
