width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">organized under the laws of the United States or any State thereof, any Lender may, with<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 321pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">notice to the Agent and the Company, fulfill its Commitment by causing an Affiliate of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 335.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 349.32pt;">such Lender to act as the Lender in respect of such Subsidiary Borrower.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 360.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.98pt;">(b)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 313.67pt;">TBC Consent to Subsidiary Borrower Borrowings and Notices<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 421.67pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 118.26pt;">. No Advances shall be<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 375.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">made to a Subsidiary Borrower, and no Conversion of any Advances at the request of a<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 389.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">Subsidiary Borrower shall be effective, without, in each and every instance, the prior<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 404pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">consent of TBC, in its sole discretion, which shall be evidenced by the countersignature<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 418.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">of TBC to the relevant Notice of Borrowing or notice of Conversion. In addition, no<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 432.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">notices which are to be delivered by a Borrower hereunder shall be effective, with respect<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 447.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 344.41pt;">to any Subsidiary Borrower, unless the notice is countersigned by TBC.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 472.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(c)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 196.51pt;">Subsidiary Borrower Termination Event<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 304.51pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 235.45pt;">. The occurrence of any of the following events<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 487pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 319.9pt;">with respect to any Subsidiary Borrower shall constitute a &#8220;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 427.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 112.02pt;">Subsidiary Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 501.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 97.6pt;">Termination Event<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 205.6pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 210.47pt;">&#8221; with respect to such Subsidiary Borrower&#58;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 526.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 11.31pt;">(i)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 251.43pt;">such Subsidiary Borrower ceases to be a Subsidiary&#59;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 552.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 251.8pt;">such Subsidiary Borrower is liquidated or dissolved&#59;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 577.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 17.97pt;">(iii)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 335.32pt;">such Subsidiary Borrower fails to preserve and maintain its existence&#59;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 603pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.92pt;">such Subsidiary Borrower merges or consolidates with or into another Person, or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.96pt;">conveys, transfers, leases, or otherwise disposes of (whether in one transaction or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 631.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.92pt;">in a series of transactions) all or substantially all of its assets (whether now owned<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 646.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.98pt;">or hereafter acquired) to any Person (except that a Subsidiary Borrower may<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 660.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 255.08pt;">merge into or dispose of assets to another Borrower)&#59;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 686pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.98pt;">(v)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.98pt;">any of the &#8220;Events of Default&#8221; described in Section 6.1(a) through (f) occurs to or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 700.4pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 714.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 50.29pt;">&#8220;TBC&#8221;&#59; or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div></div></div><div style="--justify: justify; --position: absolute; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #CCCC; content-visibility: auto; float: none; font-size: 0; height: 792pt; margin: 10px auto 10px auto; overflow: hidden; padding: 0; position: relative; width: 612pt;"><div style="left: 0pt; position: absolute; top: 741.6pt;"><div style="width: 468pt;"><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; top: 8.04pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 300pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: none; white-space: pre;">39<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 4.85pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 22.44pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 7pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><font style="left: 72pt; position: absolute; width: 0pt;"><font style="display: inline-block; height: 4.85pt; width: 467.99pt;"></font></font></font></div></div></div><div style="left: 0pt; position: absolute; top: 0pt;"><div style="width: 468pt;"></div></div><div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 72pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.89pt;">the Guaranty with respect to such Subsidiary Borrower ceases, for any reason, to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 86.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 275.18pt;">be valid and binding on TBC or TBC so states in writing.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 111.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 168.08pt;">Terminated Subsidiary Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 276.08000000000004pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 263.91pt;">. Upon the occurrence of a Subsidiary Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 126.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">Termination Event with respect to any Subsidiary Borrower, such Subsidiary Borrower (a<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 140.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 5.32pt;">&#8220;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 113.32pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 173.71pt;">Terminated Subsidiary Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 287.03pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 252.93pt;">&#8221;) shall cease to be a Borrower for purposes of this<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 155pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">Agreement and shall no longer be entitled to request or borrow Advances hereunder. All<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">Lender under this Section 2.23 are in addition to any other rights and remedies which the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 457.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 379.31pt;">Borrowers, the Agent or any Lender may have against such Defaulting Lender.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 482.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; No replacement of a<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 227pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 360.90999999999997pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 179.06pt;">. In connection with the use,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; Make any payment, or permit any Subsidiary to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">6.2<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 313.16999999999996pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 226.8pt;">. If an Event of Default occurs or is continuing,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 411.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">then the Agent shall at the request, or may with the consent, of the Majority Lenders, by<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 426pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 70.96pt;">notice to TBC,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 451.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">declare the obligation of each Lender to make further Advances to be terminated,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 465.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 243.43pt;">whereupon the same shall forthwith terminate, and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 491.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.98pt;">(b)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">declare the Advances, all interest thereon, and all other amounts payable under this<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 505.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">Agreement to be forthwith due and payable, whereupon the Advances, all such interest,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 520pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">and all such other amounts shall become and be forthwith due and payable, without<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 534.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">presentment, demand, protest or further notice of any kind, all of which are hereby<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 548.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 184.77pt;">expressly waived by the Borrowers, <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 292.77pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 42.64pt;">provided<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 335.40999999999997pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 7.92pt;">, <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 343.33000000000004pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 44.29pt;">however,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 387.62pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 152.3pt;"> that in the event of an actual<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 577.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">6.1(f)(4), a deemed entry, of an order for relief with respect to any Borrower under the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">Federal Bankruptcy Code (whether in connection with a voluntary or an involuntary<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Arial&#39;, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 142.5pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 10.64pt;">(i)<font style="display: inline-block; width: 386.79pt;"> the obligation of each Lender to make Advances shall automatically be<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.73pt; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 77.03pt;">terminated and <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Arial&#39;, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 185.03pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(ii)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 198.32999999999998pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 341.57pt;"> the payment obligations of the Borrowers with respect to Advances,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">all such interest, and all such amounts shall automatically become and be due and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 664pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 207.8pt;">hereby expressly waived by the Borrowers.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.12pt; position: absolute; top: 689.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 274.18pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre;">ARTICLE 7<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.12pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.12pt; position: absolute; height: 8.12pt;"></font></font></div></div></div><div style="--justify: justify; --position: absolute; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #CCCC; content-visibility: auto; float: none; font-size: 0; position: absolute; top: 8.04pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 300pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: none; white-space: pre;">54<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 4.85pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 72pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">7.1<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 152.95pt;">Appointment and Authority<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 260.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 278.98pt;">. Each Lender (in its capacity as a Lender) hereby<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 86.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">irrevocably appoints Citibank to act on its behalf as the Agent hereunder and authorizes<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 100.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.87pt;">the Agent to take such actions on its behalf and to exercise such powers as are delegated<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.87pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 115.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">to the Agent by the terms hereof, together with such actions and powers as are reasonably<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 129.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">incidental thereto. The provisions of this Article are solely for the benefit of the Agent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 144pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">and the Lenders, and the Borrowers shall not have rights as a third-party beneficiary of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 158.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.85pt;">any of such provisions. It is understood and agreed that the use of the term &#8220;agent&#8221; herein<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.85pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 172.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.86pt;">(or any other similar term) with reference to the Agent is not intended to connote any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.86pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 187.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">fiduciary or other implied (or express) obligations arising under agency doctrine of any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 201.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">applicable law. Instead such term is used as a matter of market custom, and is intended to<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 216pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 382.88pt;">create or reflect only an administrative relationship between contracting parties.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 241.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">7.2<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 101.97pt;">Rights as a Lender<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 209.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 329.93pt;">. The Person serving as the Agent hereunder shall have the same<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 255.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.85pt;">rights and powers in its capacity as a Lender as any other Lender and may exercise the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.85pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 270.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">same as though it were not the Agent, and the term &#8220;Lender&#8221; or &#8220;Lenders&#8221; shall, unless<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 284.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">otherwise expressly indicated or unless the context otherwise requires, include the Person<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 299pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">serving as the Agent hereunder in its individual capacity. Such Person and its Affiliates<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 313.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">may accept deposits from, lend money to, own securities of, act as the financial advisor<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 327.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.86pt;">or in any other advisory capacity for, and generally engage in any kind of business with,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.86pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 342.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.88pt;">the Company or any Subsidiary or other Affiliate thereof as if such Person were not the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.88pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 356.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 353.03pt;">Agent hereunder and without any duty to account therefor to the Lenders.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 382pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">7.3<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 119.6pt;">Exculpatory Provisions<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 227.6pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;">.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 407.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">The Agent shall not have any duties or obligations except those expressly set forth herein,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 421.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">and its duties hereunder shall be administrative in nature. Without limiting the generality<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 436.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 133.56pt;">of the foregoing, the Agent&#58;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 461.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 11.31pt;">(i)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.93pt;">shall not be subject to any fiduciary or other implied duties, regardless of whether<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 476pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 197.14pt;">a Default has occurred and is continuing&#59;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 501.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 14.64pt;">(ii)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.9pt;">shall not have any duty to take any discretionary action or exercise any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 515.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.99pt;">discretionary powers, except discretionary rights and powers expressly<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 530.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.9pt;">contemplated hereby that the Agent is required to exercise as directed in writing<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 544.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.91pt;">by the Majority Lenders (or such other number or percentage of the Lenders as<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 559pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 207.58pt;">shall be expressly provided for herein)&#59; <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 351.58000000000004pt; position: absolute; text-decoration: underline; white-space: pre; width: 42.64pt;">provided<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 394.22pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 145.67pt;"> that the Agent shall not be<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 573.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 396pt;">required to take any action that, in its opinion or the opinion of its counsel, may<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.92pt;">expose the Agent to liability or that is contrary to this Agreement or applicable<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 602.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.97pt;">law, including for the avoidance of doubt any action that may be in violation of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 616.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.91pt;">the automatic stay under any debtor relief law or that may effect a forfeiture,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 631pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 396pt;">modification or termination of property of a Defaulting Lender in violation of any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 645.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 102.88pt;">debtor relief law&#59; and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 670.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.92pt;">shall not, except as expressly set forth herein, have any duty to disclose, and shall<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 685.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.9pt;">not be liable for the failure to disclose, any information relating to the Company<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 699.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.92pt;">or any of its Affiliates that is communicated to or obtained by the Person serving<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 714pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.96pt;">as the Agent or any of its Affiliates in any capacity&#59; provided, that,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 728.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 144pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 395.96pt;">notwithstanding the foregoing, the Agent agrees to give to each Lender prompt<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div></div></div><div style="--justify: justify; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 493.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">otherwise authenticated by the proper Person. The Agent also may rely upon any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 508.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">statement made to it orally or by telephone and believed by it to have been made by the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 522.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">proper Person, and shall not incur any liability for relying thereon. In determining<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 537pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">compliance with any condition hereunder to the making of an Advance that by its terms<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 551.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">must be fulfilled to the satisfaction of a Lender, the Agent may presume that such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 565.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">condition is satisfactory to such Lender unless the Agent shall have received notice to the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 580.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">contrary from such Lender prior to the making of such Advance. The Agent may consult<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;
