width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">its ratable share of such amount, but no Lender shall be responsible for the failure of any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 313.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">other Lender to reimburse the Agent for such other Lender&#8217;s ratable share of such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 327.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">amount. Without prejudice to the survival of any other agreement of any Lender<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 342.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">hereunder, the agreement and obligations of each Lender contained in this Section 7.5<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 356.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.92pt;">shall survive the payment in full of principal, interest and all other amounts payable<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 371pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">hereunder and under the Notes. The Agent agrees to return to the Lenders their respective<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 385.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.99pt;">ratable shares of any amounts paid under this Section 7.5 that are subsequently<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 399.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">reimbursed by TBC or any Borrower. In the case of any investigation, litigation or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 414.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">proceeding giving rise to any Indemnified Costs, this Section 7.5 applies whether any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 428.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">such investigation, litigation or proceeding is brought by the Agent, any Lender or a third<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 443pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 27.64pt;">party.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 468.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">7.6<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 107.26pt;">Resignation of Agent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 215.26pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;">.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 493.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><font style="left: 72pt; position: absolute; width: 13.3pt;">(a)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt; width: 22.7pt;"></font></font><font style="left: 108pt; position: absolute; width: 431.9pt;">The Agent may at any time give notice of its resignation to the Lenders and the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 508.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.89pt;">Company. Upon receipt of any such notice of resignation, the Majority Lenders shall<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 522.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">have the right with the consent of the Company (if no Event of Default has occurred and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 537pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9200000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 551.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">successor, which shall be a bank with an office in the United States, or an Affiliate of any<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; If no such successor shall have been so<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 580.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 594.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">Agent may (but shall not be obligated to), on behalf of the Lenders, appoint a successor<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 637.8pt; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 652.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">Event of Default has occurred and is continuing), such consent not to be unreasonably<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 666.6pt; Whether or not a successor has been appointed, such resignation<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 681pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 427.19pt;">shall become effective in accordance with such notice on the Resignation Effective Date.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 706.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 467.99pt;">(b)&#160; &#160; If the Person serving as Agent is a Defaulting Lender pursuant to clause (v) of the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; If no such<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.95pt;">such appointment within 30 days (or such earlier day as shall be agreed by the Majority<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.95pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 144pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 74.73pt;">Lenders) (the &#8220;<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 182.73000000000002pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 122.69pt;">Removal Effective Date<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 305.41999999999996pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 234.58pt;">&#8221;), then such removal shall nonetheless become<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 158.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 347.27pt;">effective in accordance with such notice on the Removal Effective Date.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 183.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;"><font style="left: 72pt; position: absolute; width: 13.3pt;">(c)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt; width: 22.7pt;"></font></font><font style="left: 108pt; position: absolute; width: 431.97pt;">With effect from the Resignation Effective Date or the Removal Effective Date (as<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.73pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 198.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 58.36pt;">applicable) <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Arial&#39;, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 166.36pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 14.65pt;">(1)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 181.01pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 358.89pt;"> the retiring or removed Agent shall be discharged from its duties and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 212.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">obligations hereunder (except that in the case of any collateral security held by the Agent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 227pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.94pt;">on behalf of the Lenders hereunder, the retiring or removed Agent shall continue to hold<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.73pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 241.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 400.38pt;">such collateral security until such time as a successor Agent is appointed) and <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Arial&#39;, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 508.38pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 14.65pt;">(2)<font style="display: inline-block; width: 16.86pt;"> all<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.73pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">payments, communications and determinations provided to be made by, to or through the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 270.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 284.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">Majority Lenders appoint a successor Agent as provided for above. Upon the acceptance<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 299pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">of a successor&#8217;s appointment as Agent hereunder, such successor shall succeed to and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 313.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">become vested with all of the rights, powers, privileges and duties of the retiring or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 327.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">removed Agent, and the retiring or removed Agent shall be discharged from all of its<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">duties and obligations hereunder. The fees payable by the Company to a successor Agent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 356.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">shall be the same as those payable to its predecessor unless otherwise agreed between the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 371pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">Company and such successor. After the retiring or removed Agent&#8217;s resignation or<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.98pt;">removal hereunder, the provisions of this Article and Section 8.4 shall continue in effect<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.98pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 399.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">for the benefit of such retiring or removed Agent, its sub-agents and their respective<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 414.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">Related Parties in respect of any actions taken or omitted to be taken by any of them<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 428.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 275.07pt;">while the retiring or removed Agent was acting as Agent.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 454pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">7.7<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 105.24pt;">Delegation of Duties<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 213.24pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 326.7pt;">. The Agent may perform any and all of its duties and exercise its<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 468.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">rights and powers hereunder by or through any one or more sub-agents appointed by the<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 482.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">Agent. The Agent and any such sub-agent may perform any and all of its duties and<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 497.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.96pt;">exercise its rights and powers by or through their respective Related Parties. The<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.96pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 511.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.91pt;">exculpatory provisions of this Article shall apply to any such sub-agent and to the Related<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9100000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 526pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 213.81pt;">Parties of the Agent and any such sub-agent.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 551.4pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 15pt;">7.8<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 229.51pt;">Non-Reliance on Agent and Other Lenders<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 337.51pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 202.48pt;">. Each Lender acknowledges that it has,<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 565.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">independently and without reliance upon the Agent or any other Lender or any of their<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 580.2pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.97pt;">Related Parties and based on such documents and information as it has deemed<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 594.6pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.93pt;">appropriate, made its own credit analysis and decision to enter into this Agreement. Each<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9300000000001pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 609pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">Lender also acknowledges that it will, independently and without reliance upon the Agent<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.9pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; or any similar<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.99pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 262.11pt;">unenforceable such provision in any other jurisdiction.<font style="display: inline-block; This Agreement, any Notes, the Guaranties and each Borrower<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; Each Borrower hereby further irrevocably consents to the service of<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; Each of the parties hereto agrees that a final judgment<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.94pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 526pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 432pt;">in any such action or proceeding shall be conclusive and may be enforced in other<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 540pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 3pt;"> <font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 371.75pt;">jurisdictions by suit on the judgment or in any other manner provided by law.<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font></div><div style="line-height: 8.32pt; position: absolute; text-align: justify; text-align-last: var(--justify); top: 565.8pt; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 72pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 13.98pt;">(b)<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.89pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 539.97pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 612pt;"><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; left: 108pt; position: absolute; white-space: pre; width: 431.9pt;">Agreement or the Notes in any New York State or federal court. Each of the parties<font style="display: inline-block; height: 8.32pt;"></font></font><font style="font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;, serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; <td>duration</td>
</tr>
</table></div>
</div></td></tr>

<SEQUENCE>9
<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
.report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

.report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

.report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

.report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

.report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

.report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

.report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
.pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
.report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

}
